name: Le Schuman - Appart 1 ch proche Panier Vieux-Port
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 39m²
description:
Situated in Marseille, 500 metres from Joliette Metro Station and 600 metres from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Le Schuman - Appart 1 ch proche Panier Vieux-Port provides accommodation with amenities such as free WiFi and a TV. The property has city views and is 1.1 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and 1.7 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 2.7 km from Plage des Catalans.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to Le Schuman - Appart 1 ch proche Panier Vieux-Port.

Vieux Port Metro station is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Saint-Ferreol Street is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from Le Schuman - Appart 1 ch proche Panier Vieux-Port.

name: Résidence Kley
description:
Résidence Kley has a shared lounge, terrace, water sports facilities and tennis court in Marseille. Located around 1.1 km from Joliette Metro Station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.3 km away from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and a shared kitchen.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. At Résidence Kley all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for hiking and windsurfing.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.2 km from Résidence Kley, while Vieux Port Metro station is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Staycity Aparthotels Marseille Centre Vieux Port
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 21m²
description:

All apartments and studios are accessible via a lift and feature a flat-screen TV. Each unit has a kitchenette fitted with a dishwasher, microwave, toaster, fridge, stovetop, coffee machine and kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in each unit. Towels and bed linen are offered.

Bars, shops and restaurants can be found within a 2-minute walk of the property.

The nearest metro station is only 44 metres from the property. Velodrome Stadium is 6.4 km from Staycity Aparthotels Marseille, while La Canebiere is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the property.

Some units come with a balcony.

description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, ADIRA Résid'Marseille Vieux-port is an accommodation situated right in the centre of Marseille, just 300 metres from Saint-Ferreol Street and 1.2 km from Castellane Metro Station. This recently renovated apartment is located 2 km from Plage des Catalans and 400 metres from Vieux Port Metro station. The apartment has family rooms.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a shower. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Joliette Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from ADIRA Résid'Marseille Vieux-port.

name: Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 23m²
description:
Less than 1 km from Joliette Metro Station, Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed features a sustainable 4-star accommodation in the Euromed - La Joliette district of Marseille. A hammam and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. The accommodation provides a sauna, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. At the aparthotel, all units include bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is served for the buffet breakfast.

The aparthotel also offers a plunge pool and an indoor pool for guests to relax in.

Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is less than 1 km from Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed, while Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Appart'City Confort Marseille Centre Prado Vélodrome
description:
Appart'City Confort Marseille Centre Prado Vélodrome, just 200 metres from Périer Metro Station, which leads directly to the centre of Marseille, The European and Mediterranean Civilisations Museum (MuCEM), and the old port. Palais des Congrès and the Vélodrome Stadium are next to the property.

The accommodation is contemporary in style and has an LCD TV. Each room, suite and studio also have a private bathroom and free toiletries.

The buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast room. Additional facilities at this property include free WiFi and a 24-hour reception. There is the possibility to use the computers for free in the entertainment room, as well as the Nespresso Corner.

The property is ideally located just 4 metro stops from Saint-Charles Train Station. Parking is available for an extra cost.

name: Le Ryad Boutique Hôtel
description:
Le Ryad is located in the heart of Marseille, just 50 metres from La Canebiere and 1 km from the Old Port. It offers Moroccan-style rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access.

With a courtyard and an oriental garden, Le Ryad offers a range of uniquely decorated rooms, accessed through a staircase. Each is equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

There is a tea salon open daily that serves mint tea, fruit juices and Moroccan pastries.

There are 2 breakfast options, a simple one and another one including fresh orange juice, fresh fruit salad, Moroccan crepe, yogurt, croissants, bread, butter, honey, jam and hot beverage.

Le Ryad is 300 metres from the Reformés Canebiere Metro Station, and 850 metres from the Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. Public parking is available 100 metres from the property.

description_short: Private suite • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom

There is also a well-fitted kitchen in some of the units equipped with an oven, a microwave, and a toaster. At the apartment complex, the units include a private bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Castellane Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from LaFrenchCasa Canebière.

description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Castellane Metro Station, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Joliette Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from Appartement Vieux-Port de Marseille - Davso.

name: Appart'City Classic Marseille Euromed
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 18m²
description:
Located in Marseille, Appart’City Marseille Euromed offers non-smoking, self-catering accommodation. Guests can access both the Old Port and the train station from the 2 tram stops located within 350 metres of the property. Free fiber optic internet access is available.

Each unit features a desk, a flat-screen TV and views of the city. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and a shower.

Guests can prepare their own meals at Appart’City Marseille Euromed. A kitchenette equipped with a microwave, kitchenware and a fridge is available in each accommodation. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at an extra cost. Breakfast is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit and fruit salad, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided.

This property is 7 km from Prado Beach and 4 km from Notre-Dame de la Garde. The Terrasses du Port shopping centre and the maritime port are both a 10-minute walk away. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and upon reservation.

A full breakfast buffet is served every morning. Guests are invited to enjoy a drink and a light snack at the Marseille Centre’s bar, 1.13.

The air-conditioned rooms offer a flat-screen TV and a safe. Deluxe rooms feature a balcony or terrace with panoramic sea views. The bathrooms have a hairdryer, toiletries, bath robes and slippers. A bottle of water is offered upon arrival.

Golden Tulip Villa Massalia's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. During fine weather guests can dine on the terrace overlooking the racecourse. The hotel bar is open every day and serves cocktails and snacks.

Marseilles city centre is 5 km away. Villa Massalia can be accessed from the airport, a 35-minute drive away or Gare Saint Charles, a 20-minute drive from the hotel.

Decorated with Empire or Napoleon III furniture, rooms and suites at Grand Hotel Beauvau Marseille Vieux Port - MGallery are air-conditioned and offer satellite and cable TV. The private bathrooms feature a bath and shower, large mirror, hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and toiletries.

A Provencal-style Breakfast featuring local produce is served daily in the comfort of your room or in the breakfast room, which offers views of the port. A variety of hot meals and cold snacks are also available with 24-hour room service.

The front desk is open 24 hours a day and guests will be welcomed in French, Italian, Spanish or English.

The Quai du 7eme restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and proposes buffet breakfast every morning and guests can also enjoy cocktails and tapas in the Bar, with a view over the port.

A continental breakfast is provided daily and can be enjoyed in the guest rooms. The hotel’s restaurant serves traditional cuisine from the south of France. La Caravelle cocktail bar has a balcony where guests can enjoy a drink.

The 24-hour reception offers local tourist information and newspapers are available every morning.

A continental breakfast is prepared every morning at Villa Valflor chambres d'hôtes et appartements. The apartment’s kitchenette also includes a washing machine, dishwasher and microwave.

Located 6 km from the centre of Marseille, this bed and breakfast is a 10-minute walk from Parc Borely Golf Club. Free private parking is available on site and a shuttle service can be arranged at an extra cost.

name: Alex Hotel & Spa
description:
Alex Hotel & Spa is located in Marseille. Featuring a terrace, this boutique hotel is a 15-minute walk from Marseille’s old port and 200 metres from Saint-Charles Metro Station. Free WiFi access is available throughout.

Each room here will provide you with a TV, an electric kettle and air conditioning. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city views from the rooms. Extras include an iPod dock and a desk.

At Alex Hotel & Spa you will find a 24-hour front desk and a patio. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a shared lounge and luggage storage. For an additional fee guests can also relax in the on site spa.

The hotel is 2 km from the MUCEM Museum and 500 metres from La Canebière. Marseille Provence Airport is 25 km away, and Saint-Charles Train Station is 280 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel C2
description:
Featuring a grand piano, HOTEL C2, located in the Pierre Puget courtyard in Marseille, is a 19th-century private mansion converted into a hotel. It features the original marble and parquet floors, columns, bas-relief sculptures, frescoes and bronze banisters, whilst offering a minimalist, contemporary twist. It opened in April 2014.

The light and airy guest rooms are spacious with designer furnishings and have a private bathroom.

A bar and meeting room. The hotel's specially-chartered boat leaves from the Vieux Port, and is available with the beach package. Each month the hotel also hosts art and photographic exhibitions and performances.

description:
